types:type.name: flightRequestInbound
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type flightRequestInbound = {| code: String, departureDate: String, destination: String, emptySeats: Number {"typeId": "int"}, origin: String, plane: {| totalSeats: Number {"typeId": "int"}, "type": String |}, price: Number {"typeId": "int"} |} {"example": "{\"code\":\"GQ574\",\"departureDate\":\"2016\/12\/20\",\"destination\":\"SFO\",\"emptySeats\":200,\"origin\":\"ORD\",\"plane\":{\"totalSeats\":400,\"type\":\"Boeing 747\"},\"price\":399}"}
